Package org.forgerock.opendj.server.config.client

Interface MonitorBackendCfgClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BackendCfgClient, ConfigurationClient, LocalBackendCfgClient
    public interface MonitorBackendCfgClient
extends LocalBackendCfgClient
    A client-side interface for reading and modifying Monitor Backend settings.

    The Monitor Backend allows clients to access the information made available by directory server monitor providers.

    • Method Summary
